data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My aunt was in a rock band when she was a teenager. Her ____ used ____ get ____ every Saturday morning ____ practice ____ her father's garage. They ____ a ____ shows ____ local ____ and ____. They even recorded an album, but she has never let us listen to it!
data.partBlankContent: My aunt was in a rock band when she was a teenager. Her ba__ used t_ get toge____ every Saturday morning t_ practice i_ her father's garage. They pla___ a f__ shows a_ local cl___ and ba__. They even recorded an album, but she has never let us listen to it!
data.fullContent: My aunt was in a rock band when she was a teenager. Her band used to get together every Saturday morning to practice in her father's garage. They played a few shows at local clubs and bars. They even recorded an album, but she has never let us listen to it!
data.answer: 我姑姑十几岁的时候参加了一个摇滚乐队。她的乐队过去常常在每个星期六早上聚在一起，在她父亲的车库里练习。他们在当地的俱乐部和酒吧表演了一些节目。他们甚至还录制了一张专辑，但是她从来没有让我们听过!
